doc.title: GS KOREA OPEN - SEMIS,
doc.source_uri: 2025-09-02/GS KOREA OPEN - SEMIS, DEFENSE, VALUE UP, TELCO GS 韩国公开赛 - 半导体、国防、价值 提升、电信_2025-09-02

passages.text: Market Insights | Markets | Equities 市场洞察 | 市场 | 股票

US markets were closed due to labor day holidays, while Nasdaq & S&P futures are seen marginally higher. Eyes if KOSPI may stage a rebound today with sectors including defense, following European peers rally overnight.
由于劳动节假期，美国市场休市，而纳斯达克和标普期货小幅走高。市场关注KOSPI今日是否会出现反弹，尤其是包括防务在内的板块，因隔夜欧洲股市普遍上涨。

- SEMIS | AUG EXPORTS & DRAM SENTIMENT: According to MOTIE and TRASS, exports value for memory (+44% yoy) and MLCC (+17% yoy) saw positive yoy growth - while display (-9% yoy) and Li-ion batteries (-41% yoy) exports declined yoy. - Separately, DRAM sentiment is pointing in a slightly positive direction with consensus expectation for Hynix 2026 HBM pricing still more positive than our view. https://tinyurl.com/4npmu6yp, https://tinyurl.com/44pczduc

半导体 | 8 月出口与 DRAM 情绪：据韩国产业通商资源部 (MOTIE) 和 TRASS 数据显示，存储器出口额同比增长 44%，MLCC 同比增长 17%，而显示器出口同比下降 9%，锂离子电池出口同比下降 41%。此外，DRAM 市场情绪略微积极，市场普遍预期 2026 年 Hynix 的 HBM 价格走势仍比我们预期更为乐观。https://tinyurl.com/4npmu6yp, https://tinyurl.com/44pczduc

FABS: Although both SEC and Hynix have turned conservative on adding capacity in their respective China fabs since 2022, given that the U.S. govt mentioned it does not intend to grant license to upgrade technology at the fabs in China, VEU removal could limit line upgrades, which in turn could tighten supply of advanced memory and increase difficulties in competing against peers using China capacity. https://tinyurl.com/nwbk7bu4
半导体 | GIR 观点——美国撤销对中国晶圆厂 WFE 出口许可：尽管 SEC 和 Hynix 自 2022 年以来在各自中国晶圆厂扩产方面已趋于保守，但鉴于美国政府表示无意批准在中国晶圆厂进行技术升级的许可，VEU 的移除可能限制产线升级，从而收紧先进存储器的供应，并增加与使用中国产能的竞争对手竞争的难度。https://tinyurl.com/nwbk7bu4

DEFENSE (+): European defense stocks rallied overnight with Rheinmetall +3.5% after reports that the EU are working for potential military deployments to Ukraine as part of post- conflict security guarantees. (NSN T1WGH5GOT0JT ) Separately, Korea is said to agree with the US in ramping up its defense budget to 3.5% of GDP (current 2026 budget at 2.4%), while discussing the purchase of US arms worth W34tn (c. \(\) 25bn\$). https://is.gd/EiNwXI
国防（+）：受报道称欧盟正致力于在冲突后安全保障框架下，可能向乌克兰进行军事部署的消息影响，欧洲防务类股隔夜上涨，Rheinmetall上涨3.5%。(NSN T1WGH5GOT0JT )另外，据称韩国同意与美国将国防预算提高至占GDP的3.5%（当前2026年预算为2.4%），同时讨论购买价值34万亿韩元（约250亿美元）的美国武器。https://is.gd/EiNwXI

VALUE UP: According to local reports, the PPP are seeking to propose a bill to ease the CGT threshold to W10bn (from current W5bn, and against MJP- proposed W1bn) in order to revitalize the Korean equity markets. https://is.gd/1jB7X2
价值上调：据当地报道，PPP正寻求提议一项法案，将资本利得税门槛从当前的50亿韩元放宽至100亿韩元（而MJP提议为10亿韩元），以振兴韩国股市。https://is.gd/1jB7X2

TELCO (TKT(030200) and LGU(032640) are also said to have experienced data breaches on what is suspected to be a hacking incident, similar to that of SKT(017670). However, the two telecom carriers are said to be denying the occurrence of any hacking incidents. https://is.gd/nHa2ZN
电信（- ）：据称KT(030200)和LGU(032640)也遭遇了疑似与SKT(017670)类似的黑客事件导致的数据泄露。然而，据称这两家电信运营商否认发生过任何黑客事件。https://is.gd/nHa2ZN

RETAIL INVESTORS LOOK ABROAD: In August, South Korea's average daily stock trading volume decreased by approximately 18.05% compared to July. Concurrently, overseas stock settlement amounts increased, driven by South Korean retail investors who continued to shift their focus to foreign markets. This trend saw retail investors diversifying their overseas portfolios, notably pivoting from US big tech stocks

towards crypto- related assets. Domestic brokerages anticipate that the sluggish trend in the domestic market will persist into September due to seasonal factors and downward revisions of KOSPI's estimated net profits. https://tinyurl.com/3hhhrj67

散户投资者目光转向海外：8月，韩国日均股票交易量较7月下降约 \(18.05\%\) 。与此同时，海外股票结算金额上升，主要受韩国散户投资者推动，他们持续将关注转向海外市场。这一趋势显示，散户投资者在海外投资组合中进行多元化配置，显著地从美国大型科技股转向与加密货币相关的资产。国内券商预计，由于季节性因素以及对KOSPI预估净利润的下调，国内市场的低迷趋势将延续至7月。https://tinyurl.com/3hhhrj67

- AUTOS | AUG GLOBAL WHOLESALE: HMC and KIA released global wholesale numbers for August where HMC delivered 336,395 units (+0.3% mom) and Kia 253,950 units (-3.4% mom). We believe August monthly numbers are in line with HMC & Kia business targets, with YTD numbers for domestic, overseas, and global all running near 67% of annual guidance (considering 3Q weak seasonality). https://tinyurl.com/4emppvra
汽车 | 8月全球批发：HMC和KIA公布了8月全球批发数据，HMC交付336,395辆（环比 \(+0.3\%\) ），Kia交付253,950辆（环比- 3.4%）。我们认为8月的月度数据符合HMC和Kia的业务目标，年初至今的国内、海外及全球数据均接近全年指引的67%（考虑到三季度的淡季因素）。https://tinyurl.com/4emppvra
- POSCO INTL(047050): Secures a W600bn (\$430mn) order for drive motor cores from a North American EV manufacturer. https://tinyurl.com/yc2wktke
POSCO INTL (047050)：获得来自一家北美电动车制造商的价值6,000亿韩元（4.3亿美元）的驱动电机铁芯订单。https://tinyurl.com/yc2wktke

- SAMSUNG LIFE(032830): The FSS Governor announced a provisional direction to fundamentally resolve Samsung Life Insurance's accounting controversy, aiming to normalize practices in line with IFRS. The core issue revolves around whether the accounting treatment of its affiliate stakes should continue as an exception under 'policyholder equity adjustment,' despite IFRS 17 requiring such dividend resources to be treated as insurance liabilities. This decision follows intensified debate, notably from the Korea Accounting Standards Board, concerning Samsung Life's accounting for its Samsung Fire & Marine Insurance stake. https://tinyurl.com/ybjzw58t

三星生命（032830）：金融监督院院长宣布了一项临时方向，旨在从根本上解决三星生命保险的会计争议，使其实务与IFRS保持一致。核心问题在于，尽管IFRS 17要求将此类分红资源视为保险负债，但其关联公司股权的会计处理是否应继续作为“保单持有人权益调整”的例外。此决定是在围绕三星生命对其所持三星火灾海上保险股份的会计处理，尤其是来自韩国会计准则委员会的激烈争论之后作出的。https://tinyurl.com/ybjzw58t
- MACRO | AUG EXPORTS: Korea's headline exports fell 1.2% mom sa in August, contracting after two months of increases. Tech exports contracted 1.1%, weighed
down by pull- back in semiconductor exports. https://tinyurl.com/292d7vcv
宏观 | 8 月出口：韩国 8 月经季调环比出口下降 \(1.2\%\) ，在连续两个月增长后出现收缩。科技出口下降 \(1.1\%\) ，主要受半导体出口回落拖累。https://tinyurl.com/292d7vcv
\* South Korea Technology: Semiconductors - Memory: U.S. revokes license- free status of Hynix and SEC on WFE exports to their China fabs [https://tinyurl.com/nwbk7bu4]
\* 韩国科技：半导体 - 存储器：美国撤销了对海力士和三星电子向其中国工厂出口晶圆制造设备 (WFE) 的免许可待遇 [https://tinyurl.com/nwbk7bu4]
\* South Korea Tech: August 2025 export tracker: memory exports show acceleration in yoy growth [https://tinyurl.com/4npmu6yp]
\* 韩国科技：2025 年 8 月出口追踪：存储器出口同比增速加快 [https://tinyurl.com/4npmu6yp]
\* South Korea Technology: August 2025 GS DRAM sentiment indicator: HBM pricing expectation coming down but still more positive than GSe [https://tinyurl.com/44pczdcu]
\* 韩国科技：2025 年 8 月 GS DRAM 情绪指标：HBM 价格预期有所下降，但仍比 GSe 更为乐观 [https://tinyurl.com/44pczdcu]
\* South Korea Automobiles: Hyundai Motor/Kia August global wholesale \(+0.4\% / + 0.8\%\) YoY [https://tinyurl.com/4emppvra]
\* 韩国汽车：现代汽车/起亚 8 月全球批发量同比 \(+0.4\% / + 0.8\%\) [https://tinyurl.com/4emppvra]
\* South Korea: Pull- back in August Exports on Weaker US Demand in Late August [https://tinyurl.com/292d7vcv]
\* 韩国：8 月出口回落，因 8 月下旬美国需求走弱 [https://tinyurl.com/292d7vcv]
